data.description:
Race against other players in this Physics filled platformer obstacle course known as MarathRUN!

This demo has 7 available Arenas where you get to compete against 5 people to see who will get the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place!

This physics enabled game will make you feel like you are actually in the game and any forces you receives will push you away!

changelog.change_log: Added in game instructions for grappling hooks

- New Arena - Arena 7 added!
- New Hook game mechanics added -> Grappling Hooks!
- Players can now use their Oculus name in game.
- Global Leaderboards now available for Oculus Users!
- Smooth Rotation lock issue fixed.
- Boosted Microphone audio in multiplayer
- Increased Game Graphics line brightness to resemble vaporwave design more.

Fixed the issue with the single player where it loads all the arenas making it unplayable.
Single Player button can now only be clicked once.
Rooms will be temporarily closed while players are voting for Arenas to avoid glitches.
bug fixed: player leaving midgame will now be counted on the player count

v1.0.0.3.1 - 7/4/21 update

- Players can now join a game that is in progress once again. (It was disabled on v1.0.0.3 due to some bugs)
- Each arenas now display how many players are in the Arena in constrast to how many players reached the finish line
- Single Player version is now available due to high demand
- "Wall with holes" obstacle height shortened
- Left Handed dominant switch option now available

- Made it easier for players to climb back up from ledges
- Updated the playground with a new obstacle
- Updated the Tutorial with a new obstacle
- Modified the Lobby to display cause of player disconnection
- Reverted back waiting area to pre v0.0.4.6 where players cannot join a game that is in progress and can only join when players are in waiting area.
- Added display that shows how many players are in the arena vs how many reached the finish line already.

Fixed Arena 6 spinning platform where other players do not move along with the platform but only the room maker does.
Fixed Arena 5 spawn point so the player no longer gets spawned on the floor.
Reduced height of the player spawning when they fall off the waiting area.

5/1/21 - Update Log
- Potential fix to create room issue added where the player tries to create a new room but sends them back to the lobby screen instead of the Arenas.
- Increased disconnect tolerance due to lag so the player won't get disconnected after a short lag spike.
- Modified Arena 2 Zone 4 to let the player land the hook better on the ziplines.

5/9/21 - Update Log v0.0.4.5
- Hook can now be grabbed properly with 2 hands.
- Hand Physics updated so there are little to no springy effect when jumping from high places and bouncing back like a rubber band.
- Changed the distance for the hook to return to the player from 2.5 meters to 1.5 meters
- New checkpoint added on the tutorial arena.
- Added fall nets in the center of the boulder zones on Arena 3.
- Added fall nets on all 6 corners of the Arenas now so player will not fall forever outside the Arena if a glitch happened.
- FLYING PLAYER BUG IS NOW FIXED!
- Updated tutorial arena and removed the part where the player's hands needs to be stuck to continue. (player input required)
- Added a reconnect button on the lobby so the player won't have to reset the game when disconnected from the server. (player input required)
- Increased finish line height

6/15/21 - Update Log v0.0.4.6
- Possible fix to the Room creation issue where the player cannot create a room or is having difficulties creating a room
- Fixed issue with the finish line cameras where if the player is still holding it, they get sent far away
- Updated game textures
- Fixed Arena 3 Zone 4 issue with the slowdown speed
- Fixed issue when the player moves their hand fast enough when putting the hook back to the holster and try to grab something, the hook gets grabbed instead even though the player's hand is nowhere near the holster.

4/17/21 - Update Log
- Updated algorithm to make sure that when a player leaves, the player count gets updated.
- Added permission prompt before getting to the lobby for microphone usage access.
- Updated tutorial to include the updated position of the hooks
- Increased game update rate from 80 Hz to 90 Hz
- Added Mute self button on Game Menu so player can choose to not use the microphone
